snippet: The four major card networks vary greatly in the coverage that their credit cards provide. American Express does not offer rental car insurance on some popular sport utility vehicles, for example, while Visa covers the cost of towing.
abstract: The four major card networks vary greatly in the coverage that their credit cards provide. American Express does not offer rental car insurance on some popular sport utility vehicles, for example, while Visa covers the cost of towing.

headline.main: Comparing Credit Cards' Auto Rental Insurance
